FuncDef:
The cfm mac-level check disable command disables the device from checking the LEVEL field in the EOAM multicast MAC address information.
The undo cfm mac-level check disable command enables the device to check the LEVEL field in the EOAM multicast MAC address information.
By default, the device is enabled to check the LEVEL field in the EOAM multicast MAC address information.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, the device is enabled to check the LEVEL field in the EOAM multicast MAC address information. If a device for connecting to the device does not check the LEVEL field in the EOAM multicast MAC address information, the NE40E fails to connect to the device. To resolve this issue, run the cfm mac-level check disable command to disable the NE40E from checking the LEVEL field in the EOAM multicast MAC address information.
